text: 3. Find the following two quantities. (a) The number of levels in the tree down to the shallowest leaf. Hint: Is the shallowest leaf on the leftmost side of the tree, the rightmost side, or somewhere else? If youâ€™ve already described the problem size of the leftmost and rightmost nodes at level i as a function of 4, then set that equal to the problem size you expect at the leaves and solve for . (b) The number of levels in the tree down to the deepest leaf.
